item.title: Outside 56 Ryeworth large black truck parked, 18th February
item.description:
On a single H line. It is causing a total obstruction of vision for those leaving Hambrook street and those going along Ryeworth rd turning to Hambrook st Reg No is TCD111

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Hambrook Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose paving slab with rodent activity under slabs, 18th February
item.description:
Alley to side of 2PIGS next to fire escape. broken slab with large cavity under. you can see the surface water drain pipe, but there is a large void around it that looks to be used by rodents. This is bringing potential rodent activity to the 2Pigs public house

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 18th February
item.description:
PERM - Could you raise a perm repair enquiry for Phil Carter re the below job . 43117805 ENWD: REMOVE LARGE UNSAFE DIRECTIONAL SIGN Large directional sign is hanging by only one bracket very close to live traffic lane. Removal needed to ensure safe and doesn't fall. Location: A40 Arle Court Roundabout, Junction with Hatherley Lane, Cheltenham W3W/// passes.rope.safe

item.description:

item.title: Proceed in direction indicated by the arrow sign pointing wrong way, 18th February
item.description:
There are two signs at the junction of Albion Street with Hewlett Road warning drivers that a right turn is forbidden. However, the recently erected 'proceed in direction indicated by the arrow' sign informs the driver to turn right.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albion Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
